com.qtplaf.library.trading.data

Class DataList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.trading.data.DataList
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelegateDataList, IndicatorDataList, PersistorDataList

    public abstract class DataList
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of data objects.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getIndicatorDataLists

        public static java.util.List<IndicatorDataList> getIndicatorDataLists(java.util.List<DataList> dataLists)
        Returns the list of first level indicator data lists, given a list of data lists.
        Parameters:
        dataLists - The source list of data lists.
        Returns:
        The list of first level indicator data lists.

      • getIndicatorDataListsToCalculate

        public static java.util.List<IndicatorDataList> getIndicatorDataListsToCalculate(java.util.List<DataList> dataLists)
        Returns the list of indicator data lists, in the order of precendence they are to be calculated. If an indicator uses the data of another indicator, the last one must be calculated first.
        Parameters:
        dataLists - The source list of data lists.
        Returns:
        The list of indicator data lists,

      • isMaximum

        public boolean isMaximum(int dataIndex,
                         int valueIndex,
                         int period)
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the value at value index, of the data at data index, is a maximum for the argument period.
        Parameters:
        dataIndex - The index of the data element.
        valueIndex - The index of the value within the data.
        period - The period, number of data elements to check before and after.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the value is a maximum.

        Parameters:
        dataIndex - The index of the data element.
        valueIndex - The index of the value within the data.
        period - The period, number of data elements to check before and after.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the value is a minimum.
